name: Gabriel Bolonhez
tagline: Building modernity, professionalism, and quality solutions
location: São Bernardo do Campo, São Paulo, Brazil

about.title: About Me
about.description: Fullstack Developer with 2+ years of IT experience, focused on creating modern and scalable web solutions. My journey started at Service Desk, evolved to QA, and today I work with development using Angular, React, TypeScript, C# .NET and SQL. Passionate about clean code, agile methodologies, and transforming complex challenges into elegant solutions that generate real impact.
